name: DHI Verification
description: DHI envisioned the need for Deft handling of the issue, its professional team could see how court record verification was the apt solution for the problem. Headline: Extending your verification needs. Facilitating through expertise, data and network.
ShortDescription: In 2010, a team of professionals from the legal, academic, accounting, and information technology fields came together with a vision to provide professional and value-added services to the business community in India.
enhanced_description: DHI Verification provides specialized auditable verification services, with a strong focus on court record verification, to address the critical need for reliable background checks in the business community. Established in 2010 by professionals from legal, academic, accounting, and IT fields, DHI has built an extensive network within the legal fraternity across India to ensure professional, reliable, and timely resolutions. The service has demonstrated significant scalability, growing from 300 verifications per month to over 3000 verifications per day with an impressive turnaround time of 97-99%. DHI is committed to continuous improvement, reinvesting revenues into software enhancements and business process optimization, and holds ISO 9001 and ISO 27001 certifications.
